pr_title: Publish PXF releases to all RelEng buckets

timeline.message:
Publish PXF releases to all RelEng buckets

Previously we only published to GP6 release bucket.

Authored-by: Oliver Albertini <oalbertini@vmware.com>

timeline.bodyText: I would add a suffix _releng to the end of these resource names so it is clear we are uploading them to the releng realm and not our own release buckets
timeline.author: denalex
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -278,6 +278,40 @@ resources:
     branch: ((ccp-git-branch))
     private_key: ((ccp-git-key))
     uri: ((ccp-git-remote))
+
+- name: pxf_gp5_rhel6_release

replies.bodyText: or _prod will also work I guess
replies.author: frankgh
